#text=Two weeks ago , I called the beauty salon and made an appointment to get a hair cut .
#text=Today is the day to go get my hair cut , and I was pretty excited .
#text=I walked in and talked to the receptionist .
#text=She told me it would be a few minutes , so I went to sit down .
#text=While I was waiting , I thumbed through some of the magazines in the waiting area to get ideas of how I wanted my hair cut .
#text=A few minutes later , the stylist called me back to sit in her chair .
#text=We talked about the weather while she washed and shampooed my hair .
#text=She took a comb and started to comb the tangles out of my hair .
#text=The shampoo made my hair smell really nice , and I complemented her on the choice .
#text=She asked what style of hair cut I wanted .
#text=I told her I had decided on a bob .
#text=She sectioned my hair off with clips and started to trim it with her scissors .
#text=I have to admit that every time I get a hair cut , I get a little nervous .

#text=There is always the chance of not being happy with the end result , but my stylist reassured me that she had years of experience and she would ask periodically if I thought the length was getting to short .
#text=A few minutes later , we both agreed that the length was right .
#text=She finished the cut , and I went under the hair dryer for awhile .
#text=I read some more magazines , since I could n't hear to talk with anyone .
#text=When I was finished I went up front to the receptionist and paid for my hair cut .
